content.title: Introduction
content.description: This section provides an overview of the Iris dataset and the classification task.

content.title: Length vs Width Images
content.description: Scatter plots showing the relationship between sepal length and width, and petal length and width.
content.comment: These scatter plots illustrate the relationships between sepal length and width, as well as petal length and width, for the different species of iris.

content.title: Length vs Width Charts
content.description: Scatter plots showing the relationship between sepal length and width, and petal length and width.
content.comment: These scatter plots illustrate the relationships between sepal length and width, as well as petal length and width, for the different species of iris.
